entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
